Step9.Prompt:
Click the button below to set Adventurer creation to complete. You will no longer see the "Adventurer Creation" button in the Actor Sheet header.

Enjoy your adventures and may the Gods and spirits be with you!

AwardExperience.GainedExperienceInfo: {actorName} just gained an experience check in {itemName}!

confirmTransferPhysicalItem.title: Really give {itemName} to {targetActor}?
confirmTransferPhysicalItem.ReallyGiveItemSingle: Really give {itemName} to {targetActor}?  It will be removed from {sourceActor}'s inventory.
confirmTransferPhysicalItem.ReallyGiveItemQuantity: Really give {itemName} to {targetActor}?  It will be removed from {sourceActor}'s inventory, or {sourceActor}'s inventory quantity will be reduced.
confirmTransferPhysicalItem.GiveHowMany: Give how many {itemName} to {targetActor}?  {sourceActor}'s inventory of this item will be reduced by the amount chosen, or the item will be deleted if you choose to give the maximum amount of {maxQty}.

spiritMagicChat.CantCastSpellAboveLearnedLevel: Can't cast spell above learned level.
spiritMagicChat.NotEnoughMagicPoints: Not enough magic points left to cast this spell.
spiritMagicChat.SuccessfullyCastInfo: Successfully cast a spirit magic spell, using {amount} magic points.

confirmItemDeleteDialog.title: Delete {itemType}: {itemName}
confirmItemDeleteDialog.content: Are you sure you want to delete the {itemType} named {itemName}?
confirmItemDeleteDialog.contentCult: Are you sure you want to delete the {itemType} named {itemName}? This will also delete all of the {runeMagicSpell} items associated with this {itemType}.

improveAbilityDialog.title: Improvement for {typeLocName} "{name}"
improveAbilityDialog.noExperienceCheckExplanation: This character does not have an experience check in this {typeLocName} and may not improve from Experience.
improveAbilityDialog.skillOver75Explanation: You may not train in skills with a value over 75%.
improveAbilityDialog.speciesMaxExplanation: You are at or above the species maximum for {name} and may not gain any more.

experienceRoll.flavor: {actorName} makes an experience improvement check for {typeLocName} "{name}"
experienceRoll.contentSkill: Roll 1d100 and add the skill category modifier ({mod}) and gain if the modified roll is HIGHER than the {typeLocName} "{name}" value {skillChance}% or 100.
experienceRoll.contentOther: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is HIGHER than the {typeLocName} "{name}" value of {chance}%
experienceRoll.contentChar: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is LOWER THAN OR EQUAL TO {chanceToGain}%.  This is based on the Species Maximum for the Characteristic of {speciesMax} minus the Characteristic "{name}" value of {chance} times five.

experienceGainFailed.content: {actorName} failed to learn from experience and the experience check has been cleared from {typeLocName} "{name}".

researchRoll.flavor: {actorName} makes a research improvement check for {typeLocName} "{name}"
researchRoll.contentChar: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is LOWER THAN OR EQUAL TO {chanceToGain}%.  This is based on the Species Maximum for the Characteristic of {speciesMax} minus the Characteristic "{name}" value of {chance} times five.

notifications.noExperience: {actorName} does not have an experience check in {typeLocName} "{name}" and cannot gain from experience now.

runeMagicChat.MissingJournalLinkTitle: Edit the spell and add a description to have a journal link here!
runeMagicChat.OneUseWarningTip: Casting this spell will reduce both your current and maximum Rune Points for the cult!
runeMagicChat.noSelectedRuneWarning: Attempt to roll a Rune Magic Spell with no Rune selected on the chat message.
runeMagicChat.resultMessageCritical: The spell takes effect and costs no Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
runeMagicChat.resultMessageSpecial: The spell takes effect and costs {runePointCost} Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
runeMagicChat.resultMessageSuccess: The spell takes effect and costs {runePointCost} Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
runeMagicChat.resultMessageFailure: The spell fails to take effect but no Rune Points are lost.  If boosted with Magic Points, one is lost.
runeMagicChat.resultMessageFumble: The spell fails to take effect and {runePointCost} Rune Points are lost.  If boosted with Magic Points, one is lost.
runeMagicChat.SpentOneUseRunePoints: {actorName} spent {runePoints} One Use Rune Points from the {cultName} cult!
runeMagicChat.validationNotEnoughMagicPoints: Not enough magic points left to boost that much!

RQGSystem.GenerateDefaultRqid: Create Rune Quest System ID (rqid) based on current document. The rqid should be based on the english document name.
RQGSystem.CopyInputValue: Copy this value to the clipboard
RQGSystem.OtherDocumentsHeader: Documents with this rqid and language (excluding embedded documents)
RQGSystem.DuplicateWarning: Warning: Multiple rqids with same priority!

Error.NoSheet: No sheet found for document linked to by RQG System ID (rqid) "{rqid}". See console log.
Error.MoreThanOneRqidMatchInWorld: More than one RQG Document in the world (not in Compendia) matched the rqid "{rqid}", lang "{lang}", and priority "{priority}". Please review your RQG System settings.  See console log for item ids.
Error.MoreThanOneRqidMatchInCompendia: More than one RQG Document in installed Compendia matched the rqid "{rqid}", lang "{lang}", and priority "{priority}". Please review your RQG System settings.  See console log for item ids.
Error.DocumentNotFoundByRqid: Document not found in world or Compendia matching the rqid "{rqid}", and lang "{lang}". See console log.

Warn.NameGenRqidNotSupported: Name Generation: The RQG System ID "{rqid}" is not supported for name generation.
Warn.NameGenRqidNotFound: Name Generation: The RQG System ID "{rqid}" was not found as a Roll Table or Journal Entry or the Journal Entry was not formatted properly as a Name Base.
Warn.NameBaseNotLongEnough: Name Generation: The RQG System ID "{rqid}" references a Name Base Journal Entry that was not long enough to generate a name after {attempts} attempts.  Consider adding more entries.

augmentingAbilities.title: Augmenting Abilities (RQG)

augmentingAbilities.skillFlavour: Rolling {skillName} ({skillBase}%) augmented with {augName}. Rolled {skillRoll}% on a modified skill of {skillValue}%, a {skillLabel}

characteristicRolls.flavourString: Rolling {charNam} ({charVal} x {charMul}). Rolled {charRoll}% on a modified probability of {charValue}%, a {charLabel}

hitlocationRolls.title: Hit Location Rolls (RQG)
hitlocationRolls.contentString: Rolled a {skillRoll}, a hit at the {locTable}

opposedRolls.title: Opposed Rolls (RQG)

opposedRolls.pasiveFlavour: Results: {activeName} ({activeBase}%) versus {pasiveName} ({pasiveBase}%)

resistanceTable.title: Resistance Table (RQG)

strikeranksHelper.title: Strike Ranks Helper (RQG)
strikeranksHelper.actorHint: Name of the actor linked to the selected token
strikeranksHelper.dexsrHint: DEX strike rank of the actor
strikeranksHelper.sizsrHint: SIZ strike rank of the actor
strikeranksHelper.generalIndependentHint: this action is independent, do not add to the last entry at the CT, adds it as if it were new
strikeranksHelper.generalReadinessHint: adds readiness to the action (+5 SR)
strikeranksHelper.generalSRHint: adds a given number of SR to the action
strikeranksHelper.combatAttackHint: Shows only equipped and natural weapons
strikeranksHelper.magicSpellsHint: rune spells goes at SR 1, rest goes on DEX SR, you have to ready a new spell after the first one
strikeranksHelper.magicMPsHint: number of extra MPs used to augmenting the spell, adds +1SR for each MP above the first one
strikeranksHelper.otherReadyHint: before being able to perform an action, or draw a weapon, or ready a spell after casting another one
strikeranksHelper.otherMovementHint: one SR for every 3m of movement
strikeranksHelper.otherAimedHint: all those actions goes at the end, at SR 12
strikeranksHelper.otherOtherHint: other action, you have to specify the SR
strikeranksHelper.removeTokensHint: list of entries/tokens at the CT, use the button to update the dropdown after adding/deleting combatants
strikeranksHelper.removeDescHint: removes all SR, only blank ones (without SR), or specific SR entries, from a token or for all of them

damageEnum.3: Equals or Exceeds Triple Location HP

attacker.1: Attacker rolls normal damage.
attacker.2: Attacker rolls special damage.
attacker.3: Attacker does maximum special damage.
attacker.4: Attack parried or deflected.
attacker.6: Attacker rolls on Fumbles table.

defender.1: Defender’s parrying weapon takes 1 HP damage if rolled damage is greater than its current HP. Any excess damage goes to affected hit location.
defender.2: Defender’s parrying weapon takes 1 HP damage if rolled damage is greater than its current HP. Any excess damage goes to adjacent hit location, with no armor protection.
defender.3: Defender’s parrying weapon HP reduced by the damage rolled. Any excess damage goes to adjacent hit location, with no armor protection.
defender.4: Defender takes damage, with no armor protection.
defender.5: Defender takes damage, with no armor protection, and rolls on Fumbles table.
defender.6: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s normal damage. Attacking weapon’s HP is reduced by 1 HP if damage over its current HP.
defender.7: Defender’s parrying weapon takes 1HP damage if damage more than its current HP. Any excess damage goes to the affected hit location.
defender.8: Defender’s parrying weapon takes damage over its HP, with same amount of damage going to adjacent hit location.
defender.10: Defender takes damage and rolls on Fumbles table.
defender.11: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s special damage. Attacking weapon’s HP is reduced by any damage over its current HP.
defender.12: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s normal damage. Attacking weapon’s HP is reduced by 1 HP if damage over its current HP.
defender.13: Defender’s parrying weapon takes 1HP damage if damage more than its current HP. Any excess damage goes to the affected hit location.
defender.14: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s special damage. Attacking weapon’s HP reduced by the damage rolled.
defender.15: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s special damage. Attacking weapon’s HP reduced by any damage over its current HP.
defender.16: Defender rolls parrying weapon’s normal damage. Attacking weapon’s HP reduced by 1 HP if damage over its current HP.
defender.18: Defender rolls on Fumbles table.

dodger.3: Attacker rolls on Fumbles table.
dodger.4: Attack does special damage.
dodger.5: Attack does special damage, ignores armor.
dodger.6: Attack does maximum special damage, ignores armor.
dodger.7: Attack does normal damage.

damageOutput.1: Knocked unconscious, must be treated in 5 mins or will die.
damageOutput.2: Falls, can perform no action (including healing). Will bleed to death in 10 mins if untreated.
damageOutput.3: Both legs useless, falls. If able to heal, can do so. Will bleed to death in 10 mins if untreated.
damageOutput.4: Arm useless, drops anything held. Can stand and fight normally using other limbs.
damageOutput.5: If two-legged, falls. Attack chances while prone halved, attacks against prone figure +40%.
damageOutput.6: Knocked unconscious, will lose 1 HP per melee round until successfully treated.
damageOutput.7: Knocked unconscious, will lose 1 HP per melee round until successfully treated.
damageOutput.8: Knocked unconscious, will lose 1 HP per melee round until successfully treated.
damageOutput.9: Incapacitated, in shock, cannot act until treated.
damageOutput.10: Incapacitated, in shock, cannot act until treated.

dateToChat.daysremaining: Day {dayofyear} of {daysinyear}, {daysleftinyear} days remaining this year
